content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: RFENDTC
      operator: empty
    - name: --ENRF
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000177
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when DM.RFENDTC is empty and --ENRF is not empty.
Match Datasets:
  - Name: DM
    Keys:
      - USUBJID
Outcome:
  Message: DM.RFENDTC is empty, but --ENRF is completed.
  Output Variables:
    - --ENRF
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0227
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The characterization of the end of an observation
                  relative to the study reference period.  The sponsor-defined reference
                  period is a continuous period of time defined by a discrete starting
                  point and a discrete ending point represented by RFSTDTC and RFENDTC
                  in Demographics.
                Document: Model 2.0
                Item: --ENRF
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when DM.RFENDTC is empty and --ENRF is not empty.

Outcome.Message: DM.RFENDTC is empty, but --ENRF is completed.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The characterization of the end of an observation relative to the study reference period.  The sponsor-defined reference period is a continuous period of time defined by a discrete starting point and a discrete ending point represented by RFSTDTC and RFENDTC in Demographics.
